sharingWall.title: Reflection exercise
sharingWall.body__markdown: Here is what others have said

answerChoice.body__markdown: What is it that makes you feel like this today?

exerciseSharingChoice.title: Your reflection
exerciseSharingChoice.body__markdown:
Would you like to share your reflection too?
Anonymously, of course.

exerciseShared.body__markdown: Reading your reflection can be truly helpful for someone else.

exerciseSkipped.body__markdown:
Maybe next time.

Here is what others have said.

sharingWall.title: Reflektionsövning
sharingWall.body__markdown: Här kan du läsa andras reflektioner

answerChoice.body__markdown: Vad är det som gör att du känner så idag?

exerciseSharingChoice.title: Din reflektion
exerciseSharingChoice.body__markdown:
Vill du dela din reflektion?
Helt anonymt förstås.

exerciseShared.heading__markdown: Tack för att du delar med dig
exerciseShared.body__markdown: Att läsa din reflektion kan göra stor skillnad för någon annan.

exerciseSkipped.body__markdown:
Kanske nästa gång.

Här kan du läsa andras reflektioner.

answerChoice.body__markdown: O que te faz sentir assim hoje?

exerciseSharingChoice.title: A tua reflexão
exerciseSharingChoice.body__markdown:
Ao partilhares, estás a ajudar os outros.
Queres partilhar a tua resposta de forma anónima?

exerciseShared.body__markdown: Partilhar é um dos aspetos fundamentais do desenvolvimento pessoal.

exerciseNotShared.body__markdown: Escolheste não partilhar as tuas reflexões e não há problema nenhum com isso. Partilha ao teu ritmo. Vais ter outras oportunidades.

exerciseSkipped.body__markdown: Talvez para a próxima. Aqui podes ver o que os outros partilharam.
